short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Control your Permission set object security

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Productivity tool for Salesforce administrators to inspect and manage permission sets.

With the move from profiles to permission sets in the Spring'26 release, this extension is a must for Salesforce administrators.

With this extension, you'll be able to choose objects and set permissions, then set permissions: at the tab, object (read, create, edit, delete) and field level.

The extension will also allow you to deploy these permissions to another organization you are connected to.
